thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Bill Greenberg

author: Bill Greenberg
title: Bill Greenberg
text: We found our Iceland tour guide through "Tours by Locals". Einar showed us around to see the most amazing sights, in a friendly, professional manner. He has a very nice car, provided a wireless hot spot which we all (4 of us) used. He is a wealth of information about the country and culture of Iceland. He helped us tailor each day to our own preferences and was able to offer spontaneous suggestions as we went along. I can wholeheartedly recommend his services.
